titles.title: Jobs Momentum Act of 2010
To reduce the employer portion of payroll taxes in the case of employers who expand payroll in 2010 and 2011.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/24/2010--Introduced. Jobs Momentum Act of 2010 - Allows a reduction in 2010 and 2011 of an employer's payroll taxes by a specified percentage of the amount by which such employer increases aggregate payroll over the preceding calendar year.
